title: Chalet inks franchise agreement with IHCL for Delhi airport hotel
description: Chalet Airport Hotel Private Limited, a wholly owned subsidiary of Chalet Hotels Limited, has signed a franchise agreement with Indian Hotels Company Limited (IHCL) for a new 400-room luxury hotel at terminal 3 of Indira Gandhi International Airport in New Delhi. The agreement is for the Taj brand. The hotel, which has easy access to domestic and international travellers, will also feature dining and conferencing facilities.
